Description: Like Magdon Music on Facebook! For your review and consideration- we present you with another fine Fender Guitar from the guitar collection at Magdon Music! Please read the description below and review the photos. The exact guitar pictured and in the description is the exact guitar that you will be bidding on. If there is something that you need to know that is not in this description- please contact us at Magdon Music before bidding and we will be very happy to assist! *** Please note that our guitars are tech inspected before they go out the door! Buy with confidence from Magdon Music! ***Calculated rate shipping is for the Continental USA (lower 48 only!) If you live outside of this area- please contact us for your ship rate. Pictured here we have a great deal on an authentic 2012 Fender American Standard Stratocaster Electric Solid Body Guitar in Candy Apple Red. Made in the USA, this guitar comes with a deluxe Fender locking hard case and case candy (shown). This guitar has brand new locking tuners installed. Maple neck. Normal playwear including some expected fret wear and a few dings (see photo #5) and a front surface scratch (see photo #6). Guitar really looks cool regardless and the candy apple red shine is gorgeous. There is nothing quite like an American Strat- and this is the perfect opportunity to get on at a GREAT price! Awesome guitar and will give you years of great Fender performance! ***Free shipping is for USA ONLY! (Lower 48 only!) (SC58M00.SO) If there is anything else that you need to know about this guitar or if you would like an in-hand description or more photos- please feel free to give a jingle to our professional guitar department at Magdon Music. 1 8 8 8 Magdon 1 - we will be very happy to assist you! ***Please note that Magdon Music has showrooms full of guitars- both new and used. Not all of them are listed online. If you are looking for something specific and do not see it online- please feel free to contact us! Magdon Music is open Monday thru Friday 11am -7pm (est) and Saturdays from 11am - 4pm. Title: 2012 Fender American Stratocaster Electric Guitar in Candy Apple Red w Hard Case
